roleset.name: to composed of, constitute
roleset.note: COMPRISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'comprise' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'contain'. (from comprise.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: One group is the Committee on State Taxation , which [*T*-283] comprises 330 multistate corporations and advises the Council of State Chambers of Commerce .

example.name: passive
example.text: [The FADA real-estate package , with an asking price of $ 428 million [*U*]]-1 , is comprised [*-1]of 150 properties in Texas , California , Colorado , Arizona and Florida .
example.arg: of 150 properties in Texas , California , Colorado , Arizona and Florida
